sources.title: Sunny
sources.description: Anna Neagle plays Sunny O'Sullivan, the star of a small, upscale circus run by Bunny Billings (Ray Bolger). In New Orleans during Mardi Gras she meets by accident Larry Warren (John Carroll), handsome scion of the wealthy Warrens of Waverly Hall. They fall in love, but Sunny has to deal with the conflicts between his snooty family and her down-to-earth circus pals.

sources.title: Sunny (1941) RAY BOLGER
sources.description:
Stars: Ray Bolger,Anna Neagle, Edward Everett Horton
Director: Herbert Wilcox
Writers: Oscar Hammerstein II (play)

The beautiful Anna Neagle stars as a circus performer who falls in love with a rich car dealer's son, against her family's wishes. Features spirited dance numbers with WIZARD OF OZ Scarecrow, Ray Bolger!

metadata.Plot: The beautiful Anna Neagle stars as a circus performer who falls in love with a rich car dealer's son, against her family's wishes. Features some spirited dance numbers with Ray Bolger.
metadata.Writer: Oscar Hammerstein II, Otto A. Harbach, Sig Herzig
metadata.Actors: Anna Neagle, Ray Bolger, John Carroll
